item.description: Hi I’m Dung Tri Nguyen a girl dad, a non-stop reader and learner As a developer, I’m still trying to figure out the domain of software that I would stay. I started a web developer, spent few years as a data engineer, and recently I’m interested in building high performance systems. More importantly, I’m the dad of my two girls, and love to spend my best energy with them. Leave me a message

item.title: Python CLI Application
item.description: This note summarize recent experience building a few command line (CLI) applications in Python. Here are a few assumptions before I describe the approach It’s not a CLI that process GBs of data, or need to have lowest overhead. If that’s the case, Rust/Go might be better candidate than Python. It’s not an interactive CLI like mysql. However it can still support simple interactive workflow. It’s not a CLI that do one thing and do it well.
